text: Kari Russell-Pool (born 1967) is an American artist known for work in contemporary glass art. She was born in Salem, Massachusetts. Her work is included in the collections of the Seattle Art Museum, the Mint Museum in Charlotte, North Carolina and the Smithsonian American Art Museum. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:20th-century American women artists Category:21st-century American women artists Category:Living people
title: Kari Russell-Pool
